product_desc:
Phase 1: To create a central place to search for brands by their founded date and by the State they are based out of through search and filtering. This will help a customer support local or find a product they have been looking for that was manufactured in the USA. (Clothing, Accessories, Tech gear)

Goals: To support the USA Based movement and to create one unique place to find out about new upcoming USA based brands and see the history of older USA Based Brands.

Phase 2: To create our own e-commerce platform specifically designed for USA Made / Based brands, as an outlet to sell their product and start up a storefront. 

Goals: To eliminate the tedious searching on the internet for a USA Based product that you may be interested in and to bring unity to the market and help support American Manufacturing within the workforce in the USA.
name: Founded
